name: DecryptFile
description: A thin utility task for file decryption.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: cipher
inputs.label: Cypher
inputs.helpMarkDown: Encryption cyper to use. See [cypher suite names](http://openssl.org/docs/manmaster/apps/ciphers.html) for a complete list of possible values.

inputs.name: inFile
inputs.label: Encrypted File
inputs.helpMarkDown: Relative path of file to decrypt.

inputs.name: passphrase
inputs.label: Passphrase
inputs.helpMarkDown: Passphrase to use for decryption. **Use a Variable to encrypt the passphrase.**

inputs.name: outFile
inputs.label: Decrypted File Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Optional filename for decytped file. Defaults to the Encrypted File with a ".out" extension
